Name: Celestial Intervention
Story Background: When the forces of darkness threatened to consume the world, the heavens intervened, granting a resplendent aura of divine protection to the faithful champions below.
Ability: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain indestructible. You may draw a card.
Appearance Description: The card depicts a radiant burst of celestial energy descending from the sky to envelop a group of armored warriors, infusing them with divine power. The artwork is adorned with intricate celestial motifs and golden hues, evoking a sense of transcendent strength and protection.
